headline.print_headline: For Big U.S. Banks, June's Trading Bonanza May Not Persist: Executives
headline.main: For Big U.S. Banks, June's Trading Bonanza May Not Persist: Executives

docs.snippet: U.S. banks posted stronger-than-expected trading results in the second quarter due to surprisingly active markets in June, but bank executives stopped short of saying the good times would continue....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. banks posted stronger-than-expected trading results in the second quarter due to surprisingly active markets in June, but bank executives stopped short of saying the good times would continue.

headline.print_headline: U.N. Aviation Body-Not Our Job to Issue Warnings About Dangers
headline.main: U.N. Aviation Body-Not Our Job to Issue Warnings About Dangers

docs.snippet: The U.N. civil aviation body on Friday said it was not responsible for issuing warnings about potential dangers such as military conflicts, saying that duty fell to individual nations....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. civil aviation body on Friday said it was not responsible for issuing warnings about potential dangers such as military conflicts, saying that duty fell to individual nations.

headline.main: How Murdoch's Bid for Time Warner Stacks Up Against Other Deals

docs.snippet: An analysis of both deal valuations and trading multiples of other media mergers appears to tilt slightly on Rupert Murdoch’s side....
docs.abstract: An analysis of both deal valuations and trading multiples of other media mergers appears to tilt slightly on Rupert Murdoch’s side.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Troops Take Southeastern Luhansk, Defense Minister Tells President
headline.main: Ukrainian Troops Take Southeastern Luhansk, Defense Minister Tells President

docs.snippet: Ukraine's defense minister told President Petro Poroshenko on Friday that Ukrainian troops had taken control of the southeastern part of the city of Luhansk in the country's east, a statement on the president's website said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukraine's defense minister told President Petro Poroshenko on Friday that Ukrainian troops had taken control of the southeastern part of the city of Luhansk in the country's east, a statement on the president's website said.

docs.snippet: A slide show of photographs from the past week in New York City and the region includes the Long Island Rail Road, the World Cup and a preserved frog....

headline.print_headline: Woods Shows His Rust on Rough Day at Hoylake
headline.main: Woods Shows His Rust on Rough Day at Hoylake

docs.snippet: As his tee shot curled farther and farther away from the 17th fairway, heading toward all sorts of trouble, Tiger Woods simply stuffed his club in the bag....
docs.lead_paragraph: As his tee shot curled farther and farther away from the 17th fairway, heading toward all sorts of trouble, Tiger Woods simply stuffed his club in the bag.

headline.print_headline: Deja Phew: Plane Lands on NY Highway for 2nd Time
headline.main: Deja Phew: Plane Lands on NY Highway for 2nd Time

docs.snippet: A New York pilot who landed his disabled plane on a highway for the second time in eight days said Friday he's lucky to have escaped unhurt and thankful he didn't hit anyone....
docs.lead_paragraph: A New York pilot who landed his disabled plane on a highway for the second time in eight days said Friday he's lucky to have escaped unhurt and thankful he didn't hit anyone.

headline.print_headline: Lebanon's Hariri Calls for Lawmakers to Elect a President
headline.main: Lebanon's Hariri Calls for Lawmakers to Elect a President

docs.snippet: Former Prime Minister Saad al-Hariri on Friday called on lawmakers to elect a president after nearly two months of a power vacuum in Lebanon....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Prime Minister Saad al-Hariri on Friday called on lawmakers to elect a president after nearly two months of a power vacuum in Lebanon.

headline.print_headline: Organizers: Russian Grand Prix to Go Ahead
headline.main: Organizers: Russian Grand Prix to Go Ahead

docs.snippet: Organizers insist Russia's first Formula One Grand Prix will go ahead as planned despite an airliner being shot down in the conflict zone in eastern Ukraine....
docs.lead_paragraph: Organizers insist Russia's first Formula One Grand Prix will go ahead as planned despite an airliner being shot down in the conflict zone in eastern Ukraine.

headline.print_headline: White House Party Crasher Fails to Make Ballot
headline.main: White House Party Crasher Fails to Make Ballot

docs.snippet: One-time White House party crasher and former reality television figure Tareq Salahi has failed to submit enough valid signatures to qualify for the ballot as an Independent Green Party candidate for outgoing U.S. House Majority Leader Eric Cantor...
docs.lead_paragraph: One-time White House party crasher and former reality television figure Tareq Salahi has failed to submit enough valid signatures to qualify for the ballot as an Independent Green Party candidate for outgoing U.S. House Majority Leader Eric Cantor's seat in Congress.
